column2: BRIEF-Blackrock Debt Strategies Fund Announces Expiration And Preliminary Results Of Tender Offer April 17 (Reuters) - BlackRock Debt Strategies Fund Inc : * BLACKROCK DEBT STRATEGIES FUND INC ANNOUNCES EXPIRATION AND PRELIMINARY RESULTS OF TENDER OFFER * BLACKROCK DEBT STRATEGIES FUND INC - BASED ON PRELIMINARY INFORMATION, 26.2 MILLION SHARES WERE PROPERLY TENDERED Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
